summary: Server now supports headers in signal and query requests. The TypeScript SDK needs to expose this functionality through the various interceptors to allow developers to access and manipulate these headers.
userImpact: Developers cannot currently access or manipulate headers in signal and query interceptors, limiting their ability to implement custom middleware and authentication patterns.
proposedFix: Expose headers in the signal and query interceptor APIs to match the server-side support added in temporalio/temporal#2149.
keyQuote: Server support for headers in signal and query requests was added in temporalio/temporal#2149. The TypeScript SDK needs to expose this in the various interceptors.
